plot outline: Agni Nakshathirangal is a 1994 Indian Tamil film, directed by Rajeevnath and produced by Tati Satyanarayana. The film stars Mohanlal, Suresh Gopi, Murali, Anoop Menon, Lakshmi Gopalaswamy, Arun and Jagathy Sreekumar in lead roles. The film had musical score by Shehabaz Aman Sharreth. title: Pakal Nakshatrangal
plot: It is about the lives of a group of intellectuals in Kerala in the latter half of the 1990s.

Agni Nakshathirangal is a 1994 Indian Tamil film, directed by Rajeevnath and produced by Tati Satyanarayana. The film stars Mohanlal, Suresh Gopi, Murali, Anoop Menon, Lakshmi Gopalaswamy, Arun and Jagathy Sreekumar in lead roles. The film had musical score by Shehabaz Aman Sharreth.
